title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8154.17 - Town of Marion
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8154.17 - Town of Marion

State Regulations
(a) Main Street
(both North and South). Main Street between Route 21 North and Route 21 South
passing through the unincorporated hamlet of Marion in the Town of

Marion. (b) Mill Street between

South Main Street and the entrance to the Seneca Foods Corporation
property. Notes

8154.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
